body_html:
@quantumlicht I would assume you may get more help from StackOverflow as there are more users there. Beside this PR has been merged so less attention here.

At the moment s3 support is not part of the 1.3 release so you could only build from the master branch of the TensorFlow.

See comment: #11089 (comment) for steps of building and using s3 with TensorFlow.

@case540 has been generous enough to provide a fix so that loading s3_file_system.so is not needed anymore. As far as I understand the fix will be pushed internally so it will show up later in the GitHub.
